basic.name: Ancient Spear (Q)
basic.description: Throw out a spear that pulls Sonya to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

basic.name: Seismic Slam (W)
basic.description: Deals 176 damage to the target enemy, and 44 to enemies behind the target.

basic.name: Whirlwind (E)
basic.description: Deals 138 damage a second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds, healing for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

heroic.name: Leap (R)
heroic.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

heroic.name: Wrath of the Berserker (R)
heroic.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

trait.name: Fury (T)
trait.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking damage or dealing Basic Attack damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

1.name: Furious Blow
1.description: Every 4th cast of Seismic Slam deals 40% more damage to the primary target and costs no Fury.

1.name: Frenzy
1.description: {highlight}Every 10 Fury generated Sonya receives 1% attack speed up to 50% for 5 seconds. The effect refreshes with new stacks.{/highlight}

1.name: Tough As Nails
1.description: Every 16 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%.Stores up to 3 charges. Charges refresh 200% faster while Fury's Movement Speed bonus is active.

4.name: Shattered Ground
4.description: Increase Seismic Slam's splash damage by 250%. Targeting a Hero with Seismic Slam further increases its splash damage by 250%, while targeting other enemies increases the length of its splash by 66%.

4.name: Shot Of Fury
4.description: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding. Passive: After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals 40% more damage

4.name: Battle Rage
4.description: Activate to instantly restore {highlight}60% of the damage received in the last second{/highlight}. Stores up to 2 charges. Usable while Whirlwinding. Passive: Sonya deals 25% more damage to Mercenaries.

7.name: Life Funnel
7.description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35% of damage dealt.

7.name: Poisoned Spear
7.description: Ancient Spear deals an additional 100% damage over 6 seconds.

7.name: Stagger
7.description: {highlight}If Sonya receives 350 damage during a single Whirlwind her next Seismic Slam will stun the primary target for 0.75 seconds and secondary targets for 0.25 seconds.{/highlight}

10.name: Leap
10.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Wrath of the Berserker
10.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

13.name: Mystical Spear
13.description: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by {highlight}8 seconds{/highlight}{highlight} if it doesn't hit enemy heroes.{/highlight}

13.name: Ignore Pain
13.description: {highlight}For 0.75 seconds after using Whirlwind, Sonya reduces all incoming damage by 50% and cleanses Slows and Roots.{/highlight}

13.name: No Escape
13.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.

16.name: Giant Slammer
16.description: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional 1.5% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage and heal Sonya for 60% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Ravage
16.description: {highlight}Sonya's Basic Attacks cleave and cause enemies to bleed for 40 damage over 4 seconds. While bleeding, enemy Heroes have 25% reduced healing.{/highlight}

16.name: Nerves of Steel
16.description: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding. {highlight}This shield is increased to 60% if used while below 15% maximum Health.{/highlight}

20.name: Arreat Crater
20.description: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

20.name: Striding Giant
20.description: {highlight}If Sonya takes a fatal hit while Wrath of the Berserker is active she becomes Unkillable for 3 seconds. During that time, allied Heroes cannot target Sonya.{/highlight}

20.name: Ruthless
20.description: {highlight}Whirlwind will deal extra damage based on your attack speed. Enemy Heroes hit by Whirlwind will have their Physical Armor reduced by 10, up to 40, for 4 seconds.{/highlight}

20.name: Harpoon
20.description: {highlight}Reactivate Ancient Spear within 3 seconds of hitting an enemy Hero to pull them back to Sonya.{/highlight}
